Redshirted in 2006. Played 11 games in '07, starting four at strong-side linebacker, and recorded 42 tackles (eight on special teams), 7½ for loss and one sack with one pass breakup and two forced fumbles. Did not play against Wofford. Started 9-of-10 games in which he played at weak-side linebacker in '08 and totaled 80-11-1 with five pass breakups, four interceptions (33-yard TD against Clemson) and one forced fumble. Suffered a sprained right ankle against East Carolina, missed the next two contests, aggravated the injury and sat out against Maryland. Sat out the '09 season after suffering multiple injuries in a summer car accident (collapsed lung, fibula and tibia fractures in his left leg, separated left shoulder and broken ribs). Fell asleep at the wheel and was charged with careless and reckless driving. Returned from injuries to start all 13 games at middle linebacker in '10 and registered 92-21½-7 with six pass breakups and three forced fumbles. Team captain. Elected to not work out at the Combine., 138377=Video Reel 3 — Friday, March 12, 2010, 152838=State of the position: Linebackers — 3/3/2010, from TheWolfpacker.com, 149008=Football: Rivals.com
